item.title: Tool Settings Generator
item.description: I automated the creation of Brightspace tool settings with a Tool Settings Generator. Courses in the Brightspace Learning Management System (LMS) often have several quizzes, assignments, and/or discussions with the same settings. It can be a tedious process to create new tools one at a time in the Brightsapce LMS. I always thought there should be a quicker way to create new tools when they all have the same settings.
